price: Bila ya shaka angeli kaa ndani yake mpaka siku ya kufufuliwa.
arabic: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطۡنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ
footnotes: Na lau kuwa Yunus hakuwa katika wanao mtakasa Mwenyezi Mungu, wanao dumu kumdhukuru, angeli kufa ndani ya samaki, wala asingeli toka humo mpaka siku ya kufufuliwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lalabitha fī baṭnihi ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
